DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate relative bioavailability ( BA ) two lot E5501 40 mg tablet administer twice single oral dos healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Relative Bioavailability Intra-Subject Variability Two Lots E5501 40 mg Tablets Administered Twice Single Oral Doses Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , open label , 4- way crossover , replicate design study evaluate bioavailability ( BA ) E5501 new Phase 3 formulation Lot P97001ZZB 40 mg tablet manufacture July , 2009 ( Treatment A , reference drug ) relative Lot P01010ZZA 40 mg tablet manufacture January , 2010 ( Treatment B , test drug ) administer 42 healthy male female subject .
DOC.criteria: Normal healthy adult male female subject age great equal 18 year less equal 55 year old . Body mass index great equal 18 kg/m2 less equal 32 kg/m2 time screen . Platelet count 120x109/L 250x109/L . Women childbearing potential must agree use double barrier method contraception Randomization Phase study . Evidence clinically significant cardiovascular , hepatic , gastrointestinal , renal , respiratory , endocrine , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease abnormality know history gastrointestinal surgery could impact pharmacokinetics ( PK ) study drug . Agents associated thrombotic event ( include oral contraceptive ) must discontinue within 30 day first study drug administration . Evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal medical history , e.g. , history splenectomy . History venous arterial thrombotic disease hypercoaguable state . Hemoglobin level le 11.5 g/dL female 13.5g /dL male
